Hello! Welcome to my portfolio website

SOCIAL MEDIA MANAGER | UI/UX | MOBILE VIDEOGRAPHER | ADS CAMPAIGN

SOCIAL MEDIA MANAGER

Social media management involves planning, creating, and optimizing content across platforms to grow online presence, engage audiences, and achieve marketing goals. It combines creativity, strategy, and analytics to strengthen brand identity and drive measurable results.

UI/UX DESIGNER

A UI/UX Product Designer focuses on creating digital products that are both visually appealing and user-friendly. They combine creativity and functionality to design intuitive interfaces, smooth user experiences, and effective product flows. Their work bridges the gap between users’ needs and business goals, ensuring products are engaging, accessible, and enjoyable to use.

MOBILE VIDEOGRAPHER

Mobile videography is the art of capturing and creating videos using smartphones. With advanced phone cameras, it allows anyone to shoot high-quality content on the go without heavy equipment. Mobile videography blends creativity with convenience, covering everything from short social media clips to professional storytelling. It emphasizes framing, lighting, editing, and sound to turn simple shots into compelling visual stories—all from the palm of your hand.

My Portfolio

UI DESIGN FOR A MOBILE APP

UI Design for Mobile Apps focuses on creating visually appealing, user-friendly, and responsive interfaces that enhance the overall experience of app users. It involves designing layouts, icons, typography, color schemes, and interactive elements that fit smaller screens while ensuring clarity and accessibility. A good mobile UI design balances aesthetics with functionality, making navigation simple, intuitive, and engaging for users.

911 calls data analysis project is an analysis of the 911 calls received between 2015 and 2016 in the UK

SOCIAL MEDIA MANAGEMENT

An analysis of the loan data of a financial institution. I used bivariate and multivariate analysis to find patterns in the business data that was useful for business strategy formulation.
